title: 307 - Fun Cracker Reveal
description: On today's episode, Karen covers the Miracle in the Andes: the Uruguayan Flight 571 crash, and Georgia tells the story of Celia Cooney, the Bobbed Haired Bandit.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
